3: Poor thing... Your buddies dumped you because you're hurt, didn't they?
Here, I'll get you out! (Lifts the steel platform singlehandedly) Grab my hand.
It's alright! Nanami will take care of them if the guards come!
Now, Nanami might need to extract the information from your brain... and removes your core... I hope you don't mind!
Don't go, don't go... Nanami's got a special mission, you see! I really could use your help!
